channel.title: Lanyon on hack(pravj)
channel.description: Recent content in Lanyon on hack(pravj)

item.title: Introducing modified-lanyon, Harry, and me
item.description: Yes, you don't know me. Cool, I'm telling you that. I am Pravendra. Developer at awesome SDSLabs. Also a Computer Science undergraduate student at IIT Roorkee. When I’m not scrolling in sublime-text or vim, I am watching Discovery Channel :bowtie: I am a sincere reader and It feels nice to read about other’s experiences in different fields. Sometimes it shows new things that you are not aware about.
